Interface ErrorProne

All Known Subinterfaces:
Animated, Menu
All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • handleException

      default void handleException(@Nullable @Nullable ActionHandler actionHandler, Throwable throwable)

    • errorProne

      default void errorProne(@NonNull @NonNull SafeRunnable runnable)
      Executes error prone code that may throw a exception. When an exception is thrown, it will be delegated to the exception handler.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The runnable to run

    • errorProne

      default void errorProne(@NonNull @NonNull SafeRunnable runnable, @NonNull @NonNull Runnable finallyRunnable)
      Executes error prone code that may throw a exception. When an exception is thrown, it will be delegated to the exception handler.
      Parameters:
      runnable - The runnable to run
      finallyRunnable - Code that may run finally
